title: Gilani condemns attack on Donald Trump during election rally
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jul 14 (APP): Chairman Senate Syed Yousaf Raza Gilani Sunday condemned an attack on former US President Donald Trump during an election rally.
He termed it an unfortunate incident and said that political violence has no place in democratic societies, said a news release.
He expressed his well wishes for the early recovery of former president of United States.
